Posts.Content: raincitygirl wrote: I am 4 weeks post lumpectomy.  Started off with a little bit of edema on the surgery side but not too bad, but then started to include the same side leg, then the other arm andleg.  Has anyone else had "all extremity lymphedema?  I have not found something like this on here but perhaps others know.... Driving with the top down every day that I can.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymphedema in all extremities? raincitygirl somanywomen
